text: 6.5 1 Ko 11.16, 2 Ti 3.8, 4.4, Tat 1.11, 1.14, 2 Pi 2.3 mɨnek mɨnek bɨ ogɨnap kɨlop mɨlɨk nepal. Bɨ anɨgɨl gɨpal okok, gos kɨli ak tɨmel yɨbɨl gɨl, sawl sek lek, takaw nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl ak ma nepal. Kɨli anɨgɨl gos nepal, chɨn God anɨgup tek ak kɨles gɨl yonɨgun, tap kuŋay yɨbɨl dɨnɨgabun agɨl gos nepal.
